name: Aerachna (proof of concept)
description:
Super alpha idea about a species of Spider/Bird-type hybrid creatures that serve in worker-bee like fashion. Only a raw dump of the mechanical demo I made back then (including playing around with Juju Adams' "Scribble" system).

Jump/Glide with Space
Climb with LSHIFT
Move/Adjust glide angle with WASD
Restart room with R
